categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Renzfeil Neuwt was a Human male officer who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War.

Stationed on Balmorra, Captain Neuwt lost many soldiers to the growing menace of the Balmorran Colicoids. In an attempt to counter the ravenous spread of these creatures, he has devised a gruesome plan to cut up and poison the bodies of his fallen troops. He tasked an Imperial spacer to place these poisoned body parts at the Colicoid feasting mounds in Bugtown.
